scripts.test: npm run build_tests && npm run execute_tests
scripts.build: tslint -c tslint.json 'src/**/*.ts' && npm run clean && tsc -p .
scripts.build_tests: tslint -c tslint.json 'src/**/*.ts' && npm run clean && tsc -p .
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run test && mkdir dist && cp -r build/src/* dist/ && cp -r templates dist/templates
